thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 6 of 3720
thread.title: Bernadette

author: Bernadette
title: Bernadette
text: I enjoy NOT buying new books and I have been a solid customer of hpb.com for almost 15 years, but thiftbooks had more of the titles available that I needed PLUS the shipping was free instead of $3.99 shipping for every book you buy on hpb.com - whoa! I also love the reward dollars, too - I have already started using them. The only "con" I can think of is too many emails/spam that thiftbooks sends to me every couple of days - ugh. All the same, I love the customer service and the mission that thiftbooks follows.
